title: CryptoBank : Bank on the Blockchain
discription: A fully deployed borrowing and lending platform built on the Sepolia Ethereum Network with a seamless frontend hosted on Render.com.

title: Cloud Library Management System
discription: SetupLib is an innovative web application that allows users to search for any book and conveniently borrow it to their address.

title: Portfolio
discription: Explore my portfolio website to discover a showcase of my skills and expertise in ReactJS. Dive into my projects, see my work in action, and get to know more about my professional journey
